local_settings module

Global configuration for deepz.

local_settings.D = {'coadd': '4213.csv', 'cosmos': '/4378.csv', 'photoz': '4199.csv'}

input

local_settings.PATH = '/nfs/pic.es/user/i/idazaper/deepz/deepz'

Path where the settings.py lives

local_settings.galcat_path = '/data/astro/scratch/idazaper/deepz/input/lumus/coadd_v8.h5'

input/lumus/coadd_v8.h5

local_settings.indexp_path = '/data/astro/scratch/idazaper/deepz/input/lumus/fa_v8.pq'

input/lumus/fa_v8.h5

local_settings.inds_all = array([[0., 3., 4., ..., 2., 2., 0.],        [1., 3., 0., ..., 3., 2., 0.],        [1., 1., 2., ..., 0., 3., 4.],        ...,        [1., 0., 0., ..., 1., 1., 3.],        [1., 2., 1., ..., 1., 4., 1.],        [1., 1., 4., ..., 4., 4., 2.]])

inds_all

local_settings.inds_large_v1_path = '/data/astro/scratch/idazaper/deepz/inds/inds_large_v1.txt'

inds/inds_large_v1.txt

local_settings.pretrain_v = '/data/astro/scratch/idazaper/deepz/redux/pretrain/v'

/redux/pretrain/v

local_settings.redux_path = '/data/astro/scratch/idazaper/deepz/redux'

redux

local_settings.version = 2
